summary.span: 命名空間可讓您存取對等網路功能。

span.span: The namespace provides access to peer networking functionality.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 對等電腦如何互相發現對方和解析識別項複雜的原因是暫時性的連線能力以及缺乏位址記錄，例如網域名稱系統 (DNS) 的存取。How peers discover each other and resolve identifiers is complicated by transient connectivity and the lack of access to address records such as the Domain Name System (DNS). Windows 對等項目-基礎結構來解決這個問題，與名稱解析和對等探索配置呼叫 PNRP。The Windows Peer-to-Peer Infrastructure solves this problem with a name resolution and peer discovery scheme called PNRP. 對等名稱解析通訊協定 (PNRP) 提供對等網路的名稱解析的機制。Peer Name Resolution Protocol (PNRP) provides a name resolution mechanism for peer-to-peer networks. PNRP 為了將名稱解析網路完全點對點的方式。PNRP is designed to resolve a name to a network in a completely peer-to-peer manner. 提供基本的 PNRP 功能命名空間的類別。Basic PNRP functionality is provided in the namespace classes. 它們提供的功能來建立對等，並在它註冊對等。They provide the ability to create a peer and register it in a of peers. 它們也提供了可解決其網路端點、 TCP 連接埠、 雲端，或其他位址識別項。They also provide the ability to resolve a to its network endpoint, TCP port, cloud, or other address identifier(s). 中提供的對等網路功能的進階的功能命名空間。Advanced functionality for peer-to-peer networking is provided in the namespace. 在 Windows Vista 上 PNRP 隨附在要求的應用程式時啟動的服務。In Windows Vista, PNRP ships as a service that is started on demand by applications. 此外，還有 PNRP 電腦註冊服務可以由應用程式或使用者手動啟動，如果他們想要發佈之遠端連接和通訊的電腦名稱。In addition, there is a PNRP machine registration service that can be manually enabled by applications or users if they want to publish machine names for remote connections and communications. PNRP 第 1 版隨附在 Windows XP Service Pack 2 (SP2)、 Windows XP Professional x64 Edition 和 Windows XP Service Pack 1 (SP1) 和進階網路套件適用於 Windows XP 的。PNRP version 1 was included in Windows XP Service Pack 2 (SP2), Windows XP Professional x64 Edition, and Windows XP with Service Pack 1 (SP1) and the Advanced Networking Pack for Windows XP. 此外，還有 PNRP 電腦登錄服務可以由應用程式或使用者以手動方式啟用，如果想要發佈的電腦名稱，進行遠端連線及通訊。In addition, there is a PNRP machine registration service which can be manually enabled by applications/users if there is interest in publishing machine names for remote connection and communication.
